name: FIFA Soccer 06
description:
2006 FIFA World Cup perfectly captures the emotion and passion by giving users the opportunity to play with their heroes and the chance to win the FIFA World Cup. Control your favorite players from your home nation as you control your way through all six qualifying zones. Features realistic ball movement and behavior. Advancements in passing and shooting, inlcuding improved penalty kicks.

Features

• The complete, fully interactive 3D soccer experience comes to the Nintendo DS.
• Use the Touch Screen controls to make tactical decisions, throw-ins, and corner kicks.
• Lead your club to glory or sink into obscurity in Career Mode or 19 different tournaments
• Challenge friends to wireless games in 4-Player Multi-Card mode or 2 Player Single Card exhibition play
